title: Can we recite an ayah in our head in Ruku or Sujood if we are trying to recall the previous ayah?
transcript: but if an imam leading the prayer wants to recall where he left off in the previous raqqa can he recite it in his head the answer is no the prohibition for from reciting the quran in ruku and sujud is general so even if you're in the imam and you're in the second sajdah before you rise up you want to recall what you have recited this doesn't take a fraction of a second but to go through the last ayah and what is coming afterwards and reciting the quran in your sujud this is totally prohibited and not permissible you
